description.zh-cn: 三国时期曹魏后期权臣，官至大将军。西晋开国君主晋武帝司马炎的伯父，司马懿与张春华的长子，司马昭的兄长。
description.en: A powerful official and regent of Cao Wei during the Three Kingdoms period of China. He was the eldest son of Sima Yi and Zhang Chunhua, the elder brother of Sima Zhao, and the uncle of Sima Yan, the founding emperor of the Jin dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏权臣，西晋的奠基人之一，司马师之父。
description.en: A powerful official of Cao Wei, one of the founders of the Western Jin dynasty, and the father of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马懿之妻，司马师之母。
description.en: Wife of Sima Yi and mother of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马师之弟，曹魏末期权臣，司马炎之父。
description.en: Younger brother of Sima Shi, a powerful official in the late Cao Wei period, and father of Sima Yan.

description.zh-cn: 司马师之弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马昭次子，过继给司马师为嗣子。
description.en: The second son of Sima Zhao, adopted by Sima Shi as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 司马师的第一任妻子，夏侯尚之女。
description.en: The first wife of Sima Shi, daughter of Xiahou Shang.

description.zh-cn: 司马师的第三任妻子。
description.en: The third wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马师的第二任妻子，吴质之女。
description.en: The second wife of Sima Shi, daughter of Wu Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 249年，司马懿父子趁曹爽陪曹芳离洛阳至高平陵祭陵，起兵政变，控制京师洛阳，最终铲除了曹爽及其党羽的事件。
description.en: In 249, Sima Yi and his sons launched a coup d'état in Luoyang while Cao Shuang accompanied the emperor Cao Fang to pay respects at the Gaoping Tombs, ultimately eliminating Cao Shuang and his faction.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏宗室及权臣，在高平陵之变中被司马懿铲除。
description.en: A member of the Cao Wei imperial clan and a powerful official who was eliminated by Sima Yi in the Incident at Gaoping Tombs.

description.zh-cn: 中国三国时期北方的政权，由曹丕建立。
description.en: A state in northern China during the Three Kingdoms period, founded by Cao Pi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏第三位皇帝，后被司马师废黜。
description.en: The third emperor of Cao Wei, later deposed by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏第四位皇帝，由司马师拥立。
description.en: The fourth emperor of Cao Wei, installed by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期孙吴的将领和权臣。
description.en: A general and regent of Eastern Wu during the Three Kingdoms period.

description.zh-cn: 252年冬，孙吴与曹魏在东兴（今安徽省含山县）的一场战役，吴军在诸葛恪的指挥下获胜。
description.en: A battle between Eastern Wu and Cao Wei at Dongxing (present-day Hanshan County, Anhui) in the winter of 252, where the Wu forces under the command of Zhuge Ke were victorious.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，任中书令，因图谋废黜司马师而被杀。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei who served as Prefect of the Masters of Writing, executed for plotting to depose Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员，任光禄大夫，因图谋废黜司马师而被杀。
description.en: An official of Cao Wei who served as Grand Master for Splendid Happiness, executed for plotting to depose Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员与玄学家，因李丰、张缉谋立其为大将军而受牵连被杀。
description.en: An official and Xuanxue scholar of Cao Wei, implicated and executed because Li Feng and Zhang Ji planned to make him Grand General.

en: Guanqiu Jian and Wen Qin's Rebellion

description.zh-cn: 255年，曹魏将领毌丘俭与文钦在寿春起兵反对司马师擅行废立的叛乱。
description.en: In 255, Cao Wei generals Guanqiu Jian and Wen Qin launched a rebellion in Shouchun against Sima Shi's usurpation of power.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领，因反对司马师而起兵，兵败被杀。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei who rebelled against Sima Shi and was defeated and killed.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏将领，与毌丘俭一同起兵反对司马师，兵败后投奔东吴。
description.en: A general of Cao Wei who rebelled against Sima Shi alongside Guanqiu Jian and later defected to Eastern Wu after their defeat.

description.zh-cn: 文钦之子，以勇猛著称。其率兵袭营导致司马师病情加重而死。
description.en: Son of Wen Qin, known for his bravery. His raid on Sima Shi's camp worsened Sima Shi's illness, leading to his death.

description.zh-cn: 西晋开国皇帝，司马师之侄。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Western Jin dynasty, and the nephew of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 由司马炎取代曹魏建立的中国朝代。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty founded by Sima Yan, replacing the Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个郡，位于今河南省北部。
description.en: An ancient commandery in China, located in the northern part of modern-day Henan province.

description.zh-cn: 中国河南省中部的地级市，曹魏五个都城之一。
description.en: A prefecture-level city in central Henan province, China. It was one of the five capitals of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的高级军事将领职位。
description.en: A high-ranking military position in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏后期名将。
description.en: A famous general of the late Cao Wei period.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏第二位皇帝。
description.en: The second emperor of Cao Wei.

description.zh-cn: 曹魏官员与玄学家，曹爽的亲信。
description.en: An official and Xuanxue scholar of Cao Wei, and a close associate of Cao Shuang.

description.zh-cn: 司马师是司马懿的长子。
description.en: Sima Shi was the eldest son of Sima Yi.

description.zh-cn: 司马师是张春华的长子。
description.en: Sima Shi was the eldest son of Zhang Chunhua.

description.zh-cn: 司马师是司马昭的兄长。
description.en: Sima Shi was the elder brother of Sima Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 司马师是司马干的兄长。
description.en: Sima Shi was the elder brother of Sima Gan.

description.zh-cn: 司马师无子，其弟司马昭命次子司马攸过继给司马师为嗣子。
description.en: Sima Shi had no sons, so his brother Sima Zhao ordered his second son, Sima You, to be adopted by Sima Shi as his heir.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯徽是司马师的第一任妻子。
description.en: Xiahou Hui was the first wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 根据《晋书》记载，司马师因忌惮夏侯徽的曹魏宗室外甥女身份而将其毒杀。
description.en: According to the Book of Jin, Sima Shi poisoned Xiahou Hui because he was wary of her background as a niece of the Cao Wei imperial clan.

description.zh-cn: 羊徽瑜是司马师的第三任妻子。
description.en: Yang Huiyu was the third wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 吴氏是司马师的第二任妻子。
description.en: Wu Shi was the second wife of Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马师因参与高平陵之变有功，被封为长平乡侯，加封卫将军，开始掌握大权。
description.en: For his merits in the Incident at Gaoping Tombs, Sima Shi was enfeoffed as Marquis of Changpingxiang, granted the title of General of the Guards, and began to consolidate power.

description.zh-cn: 司马师参与高平陵之变，推翻并处死了时任大将军的曹爽。
description.en: Sima Shi participated in the Incident at Gaoping Tombs, overthrowing and executing the then Grand General Cao Shuang.

description.zh-cn: 在东兴之战中，诸葛恪率领的吴军击败了司马师派遣的魏军。
description.en: In the Battle of Dongxing, the Wu forces led by Zhuge Ke defeated the Wei forces dispatched by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 在合肥新城之战中，司马师派遣的军队成功防御并击退了诸葛恪率领的吴军的围攻。
description.en: In the siege of Hefei Xincheng, forces dispatched by Sima Shi successfully defended and repelled the siege by Wu forces led by Zhuge Ke.

description.zh-cn: 李丰图谋废黜司马师，事情败露后被司马师灭族。
description.en: Li Feng plotted to depose Sima Shi; after the plot was exposed, his clan was exterminated by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 张缉图谋废黜司马师，事情败露后被司马师灭族。
description.en: Zhang Ji plotted to depose Sima Shi; after the plot was exposed, his clan was exterminated by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 夏侯玄因李丰、张缉谋立其为大将军而受牵连，被司马师处死。
description.en: Xiahou Xuan was implicated because Li Feng and Zhang Ji planned to make him Grand General, and was executed by Sima Shi.

description.zh-cn: 司马师以郭太后的名义废黜了皇帝曹芳。
description.en: Sima Shi deposed Emperor Cao Fang in the name of Empress Dowager Guo.

description.zh-cn: 废黜曹芳后，司马师拥立高贵乡公曹髦为新皇帝。
description.en: After deposing Cao Fang, Sima Shi installed Cao Mao, the Duke of Gaoguixiang, as the new emperor.

description.zh-cn: 司马师亲自率军平定了毌丘俭与文钦在寿春发动的叛乱。
description.en: Sima Shi personally led the army to suppress the rebellion launched by Guanqiu Jian and Wen Qin in Shouchun.

description.zh-cn: 文鸯率兵袭营，导致司马师在惊吓中眼瘤破裂，病情加重，不久后去世。
description.en: Wen Yang led a raid on the camp, which caused Sima Shi's eye tumor to rupture from shock, worsening his condition and leading to his death shortly after.

description.zh-cn: 司马炎称帝建立晋朝后，追尊其伯父司马师为世宗景皇帝。
description.en: After Sima Yan became emperor and established the Jin dynasty, he posthumously honored his uncle Sima Shi as Emperor Jing of Shizong.

description.zh-cn: 在平定毌丘俭文钦之乱时，邓艾受司马师指令，率军至乐嘉县诱敌。
description.en: During the suppression of Guanqiu Jian and Wen Qin's Rebellion, Deng Ai was ordered by Sima Shi to lead troops to Lejia County to lure the enemy.

description.zh-cn: 司马师在曹叡执政期间开始其仕途，官至散骑常侍。
description.en: Sima Shi began his official career during the reign of Cao Rui, serving as a Gentleman Attendant at the Palace Gate.

description.zh-cn: 司马师年轻时与夏侯玄、何晏等人齐名。
description.en: In his youth, Sima Shi was equally famous as Xiahou Xuan and He Yan.

description.zh-cn: 司马师年轻时与夏侯玄、何晏等人齐名。
description.en: In his youth, Sima Shi was equally famous as Xiahou Xuan and He Yan.
